meanings.definition: The quality of being meek or submissive.
meanings.sent1: Her meeknesses were evident in the way she always let others speak first.
meanings.sent2: He admired her meeknesses and gentle nature.
meanings.sent3: Despite his meeknesses, he surprised everyone with his bold decision.
meanings.sent4: The meeknesses of the lamb made it an easy target for the predator.
meanings.sent5: The meeknesses of the kitten made it endearing to everyone.

meanings.definition: Instances of being meek or submissive.
meanings.sent1: The meeknesses of the students were evident in their quiet demeanor.
meanings.sent2: She encountered various meeknesses during her interactions with different people.
meanings.sent3: The meeknesses of the puppies made them easy to train.
meanings.sent4: The meeknesses of the flowers bending in the wind were a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The meeknesses of the child's behavior were a stark contrast to his boisterous siblings.
